inputs.note: PLAY & PURE FUN file normalized before merge.

categories.category_description: Activities pursued for immediate pleasure, joy, amusement, and light engagement without obligation or long-term goals.

focus.rationale: Expanded the PLAY & PURE FUN category with Barcelona-first sources including municipal open data (CKAN), official city guides, major venues, and local communities.

local_core_sources.name: Open Data BCN – Agenda cultural (dataset)
local_core_sources.notes: Dataset catalogued on Open Data BCN; accessible via CKAN catalogue/DataStore API; official municipal open data.

metrics.data_rights_signal: open-data portal listing (check license per resource)

local_core_sources.name: Open Data BCN – Agenda diària (dataset)
local_core_sources.notes: City agenda dataset on Open Data BCN (culture & leisure theme).

local_core_sources.name: GuiaBCN – Cursos y talleres
local_core_sources.notes: Official city guide for courses and workshops, filterable by district and neighbourhood.

local_core_sources.name: Generalitat de Catalunya – Agenda Cultural
local_core_sources.notes: Regional cultural agenda with thematic searches; can be filtered by territory.

local_core_sources.name: Turisme de Barcelona (Official)
local_core_sources.notes: Official tourism board site; good for curated events and attractions.

local_core_sources.name: Fever – Barcelona plans & experiences
local_core_sources.notes: Strong for real-time availability & tickets; commercial experiences.

local_core_sources.name: entradas.com – Barcelona events
local_core_sources.notes: Major Spanish ticketing/aggregator; city page and category pages.

local_core_sources.name: DICE – Sala Apolo venue page
local_core_sources.notes: Venue-specific listing page on DICE (useful when DICE is primary seller).

categories.category_description: Activities driven by novelty, discovery, movement into unfamiliar places/ideas, and the thrill of the unknown (from gentle exploration to high-adrenaline adventure).

focus.strategy: Barcelona-first expansion for Exploration & Adventure sources

categories.category_description: Activities pursued primarily for curiosity, understanding, cognitive stimulation, and the pleasure of making sense of the world, ideas, systems, or oneself.

focus.goal: Reliable sources for scraping real-time / frequently-updated learning and intellectual experiences

Reading for Curiosity & Pleasure.notes: Prioritize libraries (reading clubs, author talks), then bookstores and literary venues.

Learning New Skills (Intellectual).notes: Civic centres + Barcelona Activa are the most reliable and structured skill-learning layers.

Courses & Structured Learning.notes: For structured learning, mix institutional agendas + training portals + major event platforms.

Research & Deep Dives.notes: Academic and cultural institutions provide long-format talks and seminars suitable for deep dives.

Thinking, Reasoning & Mental Play.notes: Best surfaced through communities (Meetup) + institutions that run debates/roundtables.

Knowledge Consumption (Audio/Visual).notes: Look for screenings, debates, guided lectures, science shows; city cultural agenda helps coverage.

Meta-Learning & Learning Optimization.notes: Usually appears as productivity, learning-to-learn, study methods workshops.

Language & Symbol Exploration.notes: Language institutes + public language schools + communities.

Philosophy, Ideas & Worldviews.notes: Debates and talks are concentrated in CCCB, Ateneu, and universities.

Self-Knowledge as Intellectual Pleasure.notes: Often shows up as psychology, journaling, critical thinking, or identity lectures/workshops.

categories.category_description: Activities driven by the need to connect with others, feel accepted, share experiences, build relationships, and belong to groups or communities.

focus.intent: Real-time / near-real-time sources for social connection, communities, mutual-aid, festivals, clubs, and relationship-oriented events. Optimized for Barcelona scraping/ingestion.

Deep Conversations & Emotional Bonding.notes: Use meetup + Quèdequè to find philosophy circles, support groups, discussion clubs. (Ateneu added as placeholder if you want cross-category reuse.)

Romance & Intimate Connection.notes: Speed dating & date-night experiences tend to surface on Fever/Eventbrite/Meetup; use search queries by 'speed dating', 'citas', 'afterwork'.

Family Connection.notes: GuiaBCN has 'infants' filters; combine with festes majors calendars for family-oriented community events.

Online Social Interaction.notes: Online-only events are common on Meetup/Xarxanet; treat Facebook/Couchsurfing as restricted discovery surfaces.

categories.category_description: Activities centered on bodily awareness, movement, physical effort, sensory engagement, and the pleasure of feeling alive through the body.

focus.strategy: Barcelona-first expansion; prefer official open data and federations, then booking-system APIs, then platforms.

Everyday Movement & Light Activity.notes: Walking groups, gentle fitness, community sessions; prioritize official + recurring programs.

Fitness & Strength Training.notes: Studios and gyms are often mediated by booking systems; prefer APIs when partner access exists.

Cardio & Endurance.notes: Races + training groups; use federation calendars for authoritative competition lists.

Mind–Body Practices.notes: Yoga/pilates/meditation schedules commonly live in booking systems.

Dance & Rhythmic Movement.notes: Dance studios frequently use Mindbody/ClassPass; municipal centers also host dance classes.

Sports & Competitive Physical Play.notes: For racket sports, Playtomic is the highest-signal structured booking layer.

Body Care, Recovery & Sensory Regulation.notes: Recovery often overlaps wellness schedules; still mediated by booking APIs.

Skill-Based Physical Mastery.notes: Climbing courses (FEEC / gyms), racket coaching (Playtomic clubs), technique classes (Mindbody/CEM).

Embodiment & Sensory Awareness.notes: Somatic practices and niche classes are best found via studio schedules + city guide.

categories.category_description: Activities driven by the desire to test limits, improve skills, overcome difficulty, measure progress, and experience mastery, achievement, and self-efficacy.

focus.intent: Competitions, tournaments, races, hackathons, leagues, qualifying events, and performance challenges (offline + online) with Barcelona-first discovery.

categories.category_description: Activities focused on resting the mind and nervous system, reducing stress, disengaging from pressure, and temporarily escaping demands through calm, pleasure, or immersion.

focus.strategy: Barcelona-first; prefer official datasets and park calendars, then booking marketplaces for wellness, then global event/community backbones.

categories.category_description: Activities focused on understanding who you are, what you value, how you change over time, and how you make meaning—through reflection, philosophy, spirituality, and intentional life design.

focus.strategy: Barcelona-first; prioritize official registries + civic-center workshops, then reputable mindfulness/meditation centers and religious calendars for meaning/reflection, then global backbones.

categories.category_description: Activities driven by the desire to contribute beyond oneself, help others, improve systems, create positive change, and leave a meaningful impact or legacy.

focus.strategy: Barcelona-first using Torre Jussana + BCN NGOs; expand with Generalitat platforms (Connecta’t) and Catalonia-wide hubs (Xarxanet/FCVS); add themed portals for environment and health donation calendars; enrich with global marketplaces.

gigamesh_actividades.notes: Geek bookstore’s activity calendar (plus archive via YouTube).

barcelona_comedy_club.notes: Local comedy club with monthly calendar.

bcn_festesmajors_platform.name: Festes Majors de Barcelona – platform calendar
bcn_festesmajors_platform.notes: Great structured entry point for each neighborhood's official festa pages.

bcn_casalsdebarri_cercador.name: Xarxa de Casals de Barri – Cercador d'activitats municipals
bcn_casalsdebarri_cercador.notes: Direct query layer for municipal casals; strong for routine belonging activities.

bcn_torrejussana_agenda.name: Torre Jussana (Ajuntament) – Agenda
bcn_torrejussana_agenda.notes: Good for community participation, association capacity-building, and civic networking.

bcn_cab_agenda.name: Consell d'Associacions de Barcelona (CAB) – Agenda
bcn_cab_agenda.notes: Good hub for Barcelona association ecosystem; often cross-links into Quèdequè / Torre Jussana / entity pages.

bcn_craj_agenda_associativa.name: CRAJ (Centre de Recursos per a les Associacions Juvenils) – Agenda associativa
bcn_craj_agenda_associativa.notes: Includes an iCal feed; excellent for structured ingestion and youth/community activities.

bcn_edu_bcn_agenda.name: EduBarcelona (edubcn) – Agenda / programs for kids & youth

coverage.scope: programs for children, teens, youth (camps, activities)

bcn_edu_bcn_agenda.notes: Useful for family/youth belonging and seasonal programs (e.g., summer activities).

cat_voluntariat_portal.name: Voluntariat (Generalitat) – Portal
cat_voluntariat_portal.notes: Official umbrella; use to discover programs and link out to listings.

cat_connectat_voluntariat.name: Connecta't al voluntariat – Offers + entities directory
cat_connectat_voluntariat.notes: Excellent for mutual aid & support opportunities; many entries have structured fields.

cat_xarxanet_agenda.name: Xarxanet – Agenda (entitats & voluntariat)
cat_xarxanet_agenda.notes: High-signal nonprofit ecosystem; filter by Barcelona for local relevance.

bcn_gentgran_eixample.name: Espais de Gent Gran – Eixample (programmes & preinscripcions)
bcn_gentgran_eixample.notes: Good for intergenerational & belonging activities for older adults; likely similar sites per district.

bcn_gentgran_sants.name: Gent gran Sants-Montjuïc (casals & district activities)
bcn_gentgran_sants.notes: District-specific; expand by discovering other districts' senior-center portals.

app_fever_barcelona.name: Fever (Barcelona) – experiences, afterworks, socials
app_fever_barcelona.notes: Strong for date ideas, friend hangouts, and curated experiences; access via partner routes preferred.

community_internations_barcelona.name: InterNations Barcelona – expat events & groups
community_internations_barcelona.notes: High-quality social graph; membership gating. Useful as discovery; respect ToS.

app_timeleft.name: Timeleft – dinners with strangers (friendship)
app_timeleft.notes: New-friends format; access likely gated; treat carefully.

community_couchsurfing_barcelona.name: Couchsurfing Barcelona – events & community
community_couchsurfing_barcelona.notes: Often gated; still valuable for socializing signals.

bcn_favb.name: FAVB (Federació d'Associacions Veïnals de Barcelona)
bcn_favb.notes: Use as a directory to discover neighborhood associations and their own calendars.

classpass_inventory_api.name: ClassPass Inventory API (fitness schedules + booking)
classpass_inventory_api.notes: Best aggregator for studios/gyms/yoga/pilates inventories; requires partner access.

mindbody_public_api.name: Mindbody API (class schedules, appointments, registrations)
mindbody_public_api.notes: Powers many studios. Use for clean structured schedule ingestion where available.

eversports_provider_api.name: Eversports Manager Provider API (activity schedules)
eversports_provider_api.notes: Common in EU for sports venues; provider enables the API.

playtomic_readonly_api.name: Playtomic Read-only API (racket sports bookings & ladders)
playtomic_readonly_api.notes: Excellent for padel/tennis availability & participation data; requires access. | High-signal for club tournaments/leagues; requires partner access.

strava_api_v3.name: Strava API v3 (athlete activities; limited by consent)
strava_api_v3.notes: Useful for opt-in user activity enrichment, not broad city scraping.

decathlon_activities.name: Decathlon Actividades (events, group trainings, workshops)
decathlon_activities.notes: Includes many free recurring sessions in Barcelona stores (running groups etc.).

opendata_bcn_agenda_esportiva.name: Open Data BCN – Agenda d'activitats esportives (dataset)
opendata_bcn_agenda_esportiva.notes: Best official structured sports-activities feed for the city.

guia_bcn_esports.name: GuiaBCN – Esports category (agenda + directories)
guia_bcn_esports.notes: Good discovery layer; often points to primary organizers.

cem_network_pattern.name: Centres Esportius Municipals (CEM) – individual center schedules & class reservations
cem_network_pattern.notes: Many CEMs expose 'Reserva dirigides' / schedules; build adapters per CMS/provider.

federacio_catalana_ciclisme_calendar.name: Federació Catalana de Ciclisme – competition calendar (filter by Barcelona)
federacio_catalana_ciclisme_calendar.notes: Authoritative cycling calendar with province filters.

fctri_calendar.name: Federació Catalana de Triatló – calendar of competitions
fctri_calendar.notes: Good for endurance multisport competitions near Barcelona.

feec_agenda.name: FEEC – Agenda (excursionism, trail, climbing, training)
feec_agenda.notes: Best authoritative feed for outdoor movement activities across Catalonia.

zurich_marato_barcelona.name: Zurich Marató Barcelona (official race site)
zurich_marato_barcelona.notes: Flagship endurance event; strong structured pages for dates, registration, route, and updates.

mitja_marato_barcelona.name: Hyundai Mitja Marató Barcelona (official race site)
mitja_marato_barcelona.notes: Half-marathon with large participation; includes official app and detailed runner info.

challenge_barcelona_triatlo.name: Challenge Barcelona Triatló (official event site)
challenge_barcelona_triatlo.notes: Barcelona triathlon with multiple distances; clear date/registration news.

hyrox_barcelona.name: HYROX Barcelona (official event page)
hyrox_barcelona.notes: Indoor fitness race hosted in Barcelona (Fira); reliable for dates and ticketing.

cursa_dels_nassos.name: Cursa dels Nassos (official race site)
cursa_dels_nassos.notes: End-of-year iconic 10K; strong news feed + registration notices.

beteve_curses_calendar.name: betevé – Curses a Barcelona calendar/articles (discovery layer)
beteve_curses_calendar.notes: Useful as a 'race calendar index' that points to official race sites.

hackupc.name: HackUPC (student hackathon in Barcelona)
hackupc.notes: One of the biggest student hackathons; excellent for innovation challenge events.

mlh_hackathon_listings.name: Major League Hacking (MLH) – hackathon season listings (filter Spain/Barcelona)
mlh_hackathon_listings.notes: Discovery layer for hackathons; follow links to primary organizers for scraping.

devpost_hackathons.name: Devpost – Hackathons (filter Barcelona/Spain)
devpost_hackathons.notes: Large hackathon/challenge platform; useful for online+hybrid competitions.

kaggle_competitions.name: Kaggle – Competitions (online)
kaggle_competitions.notes: Great for 'achievement' via online challenges; user-scoped for personalization.

codeforces_contests.name: Codeforces – Contest schedule (online)
codeforces_contests.notes: Classic programming competitions for skill progression.

fce_competition_calendar.name: Federació Catalana d'Escacs – Calendari de competicions (incl. DT Barcelona)
fce_competition_calendar.notes: Authoritative chess calendar including Barcelona territorial schedule.

obert_sants_cotxeres.name: Sants–Ciutat de Barcelona International Chess Open (Cotxeres de Sants)
obert_sants_cotxeres.notes: Major annual open tournament hosted at a civic center; good structured details.

open_sant_marti.name: International Open Sant Martí (Barcelona) – official site
open_sant_marti.notes: Another large Barcelona chess open; often provides PDF regulations.

wca_spain_competitions.name: World Cube Association – Competitions in Spain (filter Barcelona)
wca_spain_competitions.notes: Official registry for speedcubing competitions; reliable structured pages.

aes_speedcubing_events.name: Asociación Española de Speedcubing – eventos y competiciones
aes_speedcubing_events.notes: Useful local layer complementing WCA listings.

rockthesport.name: RockTheSport (sports events registration platform)
rockthesport.notes: Large Spanish registration hub (running, cycling, trail, tri).

diba_parcs_agenda.name: Diputació de Barcelona – Parcs Naturals Agenda (searchable calendar)
diba_parcs_agenda.notes: High-signal for outdoor slow plans (guided routes, interpretation walks, mindful nature experiences).

collserola_agenda_official.name: Parc Natural de Collserola – Agenda d'activitats
collserola_agenda_official.notes: Often publishes seasonal PDF agendas; good for scheduled nature escapism close to the city.

diba_collserola_calendar.name: Diputació – Collserola agenda view (filtered calendar UI)
diba_collserola_calendar.notes: Alternative structured view; sometimes easier than individual park pages.

barcelonaesmoltmes_bienestar.name: Barcelona és molt més (Diputació) – Bienestar experiences directory
barcelonaesmoltmes_bienestar.notes: Good for nearby wellness escapes; use as discovery then crawl primary providers.

treatwell_partners.name: Treatwell (beauty & wellness booking marketplace)
treatwell_partners.notes: Strong for massage/beauty; partner integrations may enable structured access.

fresha_marketplace.name: Fresha (salon & spa booking marketplace)
fresha_marketplace.notes: High coverage for salons/spas; use venue pages as structured schedule surfaces.

booksy_marketplace.name: Booksy (appointments marketplace: beauty + wellness)
booksy_marketplace.notes: Often exposes bookable widgets; treat as an intermediate 'schedule surface' for providers.

yoga_by_the_sea_barcelona.name: Yoga by the Sea Barcelona (sunrise/sunset beach yoga + events)
yoga_by_the_sea_barcelona.notes: High-signal for mindful beach sessions; good for recurring schedules.

supyoga_barcelona.name: SUP Yoga Barcelona (paddle yoga sessions; beach schedule surface)
supyoga_barcelona.notes: Niche 'relaxation + water' sessions; structured listing content.

getyourguide_spas_wellness_bcn.name: GetYourGuide – Barcelona Wellness & Spas category
getyourguide_spas_wellness_bcn.notes: Large inventory and strong for realtime availability; partner access preferred.

eventbrite_relaxation.name: Eventbrite (Barcelona wellbeing / meditation / yoga / mindfulness)
eventbrite_relaxation.notes: High volume discovery; needs spam filtering.

meetup_relaxation.name: Meetup (Barcelona mindfulness, hiking, slow socials)
meetup_relaxation.notes: Great for recurring groups (meditation circles, nature walks, slow meetups).

cercasalut_barcelona_registry.name: Cerca Salut Barcelona (Ajuntament) – registry of activities/resources for health & wellbeing
cercasalut_barcelona_registry.notes: High-value intermediate layer: many community wellbeing & self-care groups with structured fields.

guia_barcelona_directory.name: Guia Barcelona (Ajuntament) – events + workshops + services directory
guia_barcelona_directory.notes: Strong canonical layer; use for identity/self-discovery workshops in civic centers and for services like EstarB.

estarb_joves_barcelona.name: EstarB (Ajuntament de Barcelona / Joves Barcelona) – free emotional support service (12–25) + family support
estarb_joves_barcelona.notes: Barcelona-specific support pathway; includes community dialogues and local points.

estarb_guia_barcelona_points.name: Guia Barcelona – EstarB directory entries (district points)
estarb_guia_barcelona_points.notes: Use to discover all district points and normalize contact metadata.

casa_elizalde_workshops.name: Centre Cultural La Casa Elizalde – workshops (incl. personal growth / wellbeing)
casa_elizalde_workshops.notes: Often includes identity/meaning themes under 'Creixement personal', 'Art i pensament', etc.

centre_civic_urgell_creixement_personal.name: Centre Cívic Urgell – 'Creixement personal' category
centre_civic_urgell_creixement_personal.notes: Great for self-discovery workshops (self-esteem, women's groups, internal limits, etc.).

cotxeres_borrell_tallers.name: Cotxeres Borrell – workshops catalog (incl. 'Salut i creixement personal')
cotxeres_borrell_tallers.notes: Filterable structure is useful for scraping; includes 'Salut i creixement personal'.

fort_pienc_tallers.name: Centre Cívic Fort Pienc – courses & workshops (incl. 'Salut i creixement personal')
fort_pienc_tallers.notes: Good for recurring courses; sometimes uses downloadable program booklets.

cotxeres_casinet_tallers.name: Cotxeres-Casinet (Sants/Hostafrancs) – workshops (incl. personal growth)
cotxeres_casinet_tallers.notes: Neighborhood-level inventory; includes 'salut i creixement personal'.

guia_barcelona_workshop_examples.name: Guia Barcelona – civic center workshop entries (examples: mindfulness/personal growth)
guia_barcelona_workshop_examples.notes: Scrape as a pattern to capture many civic-center self-discovery workshops.

institut_gestalt.name: Institut Gestalt (Barcelona) – courses & workshops (gestalt, systemic, personal growth)
institut_gestalt.notes: Strong identity/self-discovery content (self-esteem, inner child, family constellations, etc.).

mindfulness_barcelona_agenda.name: Mindfulness Barcelona (MBSR) – agenda
mindfulness_barcelona_agenda.notes: Consistent schedule surface for MBSR programs + practice groups.

mbct_spain_agenda.name: MBCT Spain – agenda (courses, seminars, retreats)
mbct_spain_agenda.notes: Good intermediate source for longer-form self-discovery programs.

kadampa_barcelona_schedule.name: Kadampa Meditation Centre Barcelona – schedule
kadampa_barcelona_schedule.notes: Structured weekly timetable; good for recurring community meditation.

zen_kannon_calendar.name: Zen Kannon Barcelona – zazen timetable & calendar
zen_kannon_calendar.notes: Zen practice schedule across the week.

triratna_barcelona_calendar.name: Triratna Barcelona Buddhist Centre – calendar-linked classes
triratna_barcelona_calendar.notes: Often links to a calendar; also mirrored via Meetup.

barcelona_cathedral_calendar.name: Cathedral of Barcelona – Activities Calendar
barcelona_cathedral_calendar.notes: Clean agenda surface for reflection/meaning events.

sagrada_familia_agenda.name: Sagrada Família – Calendar of activities
sagrada_familia_agenda.notes: High-quality schedule surface, includes reflection events and conferences.

meetup_self_improvement_bcn.name: Meetup – Barcelona Self-Improvement Group (and related groups)
meetup_self_improvement_bcn.notes: Great recurring community layer; needs dedupe + spam filtering.

eventbrite_workshop_growth_bcn.name: Eventbrite – personal development discovery ('workshop growth', Barcelona)
eventbrite_workshop_growth_bcn.notes: High volume; use classifiers to keep identity/meaning/self-discovery relevant events.

eventbrite_spirituality_spain.name: Eventbrite – spirituality category (Spain, filter to Barcelona)
eventbrite_spirituality_spain.notes: Use city filters + geocoding to keep BCN-only.

connectat_voluntariat_gencat.name: Connecta’t al voluntariat (Generalitat de Catalunya) – volunteering offers directory
connectat_voluntariat_gencat.notes: Best official intermediate layer for Catalonia; includes many BCN opportunities.

voluntariat_gencat_portal.name: Voluntariat Gencat – portal + resources for volunteers & entities
voluntariat_gencat_portal.notes: Useful for metadata: training programs, recognition, and related listings.

torre_jussana_crides.name: Torre Jussana (Ajuntament de Barcelona) – Crides al voluntariat
torre_jussana_crides.notes: Barcelona-first municipal layer; strong for local entities and immediate needs.

xarxanet_crides_voluntariat.name: Xarxanet – Crides de voluntariat (Catalonia-wide, often BCN)
xarxanet_crides_voluntariat.notes: High volume + structured tags; strong intermediate hub for nonprofit calls.

voluntariat_en_un_clic_fcvs.name: Voluntariat en un clic (FCVS / Voluntaris.cat) – volunteering offers
voluntariat_en_un_clic_fcvs.notes: FCVS network; strong for social-impact opportunities.

voluntariat_ambiental_cat.name: Portal de Voluntariat Ambiental (Catalonia) – environmental volunteering activities
voluntariat_ambiental_cat.notes: Best intermediate layer for environmental volunteering (beach cleanups, biodiversity, etc.).

banc_de_sang_calendari.name: Banc de Sang i Teixits – Calendari de recollida (donació sang/plasma)
banc_de_sang_calendari.notes: Very structured and frequent; ideal for real-time contribution opportunities.

creu_roja_voluntariat.name: Creu Roja Catalunya – Voluntariat (sign-up + programs)
creu_roja_voluntariat.notes: Trusted NGO for emergency + social programs; extraction requires care due to forms.

caritas_barcelona_voluntariat.name: Càritas Diocesana de Barcelona – volunteering pathway
caritas_barcelona_voluntariat.notes: High trust; opportunities may be behind info sessions rather than public lists.

arrels_voluntariat.name: Arrels Fundació – Voluntariat (homelessness support in Barcelona)

banc_dels_aliments_voluntariat.name: Fundació Banc dels Aliments – volunteering (stable & punctual) + campaigns
banc_dels_aliments_voluntariat.notes: One of the best BCN sources for ‘help now’ contribution shifts and campaigns.

gran_recapte_voluntariat.name: Gran Recapte – volunteering for annual food drive (Barcelona)
gran_recapte_voluntariat.notes: Seasonal peak; strong for large-scale, time-bounded participation.

open_arms_voluntariat.name: Open Arms – volunteer sign-up (sea & land; Badalona/Barcelona)
open_arms_voluntariat.notes: Applications via ticket system; scrape public role info pages only.

banc_del_temps_network.name: Banc del Temps – Xarxa Barcelona (time-banking mutual aid)
banc_del_temps_network.notes: Neighborhood mutual-aid contribution; useful for community & belonging experiences.

vxl_program.name: Voluntariat per la llengua (VxL) – sign-up + agenda/news

plataforma_llengua_voluntariat.name: Plataforma per la Llengua – volunteer subscription
plataforma_llengua_voluntariat.notes: Advocacy-style volunteering; more ‘join’ than event calendar.

hacesfalta_barcelona.name: Hacesfalta.org – Barcelona volunteering offers directory
hacesfalta_barcelona.notes: High volume; needs dedupe + ranking controls.

idealist.name: Idealist – social-impact organizations & opportunities (global)
idealist.notes: Global enrichment layer; data varies by org.
